objects.text:
• Multiple Drying Cycles
• LED Digital Display
• Energy-Efficient Technology
• Space-Saving Design

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Compact Ventless Dryer - Modern Digital Control
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive control panel
• 🔄 Multiple drying cycles including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, and Towels
• 📱 LED digital display showing time remaining and cycle status
• 🌡️ Advanced temperature control with various heat settings
• 🚪 Large capacity drum with spacious door opening for easy loading/unloading
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel and built-in cleaning reminder
• 📏 Space-saving compact design perfect for apartments and small homes
• 🔊 Sound alert when cycle completes
• ⚙️ Multiple fabric care options with adjustable drying preferences

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and modern product promotion layout for a ventless dryer. The background consists of a stylized grid and circular geometry across four gradient quadrants, adding structure and a subtle tech feel. The washer image, placed prominently on the right (id: `product_image`), commands attention. The top left includes a bold brand name (id: `heading`) followed by a subheading (id: `subheading`) that emphasizes the product’s attributes. Below that is a tagline (id: `tagline`) in fine, futuristic typography to capture attention. Key features are listed textually on the lower left (id: `description`). Price is displayed boldly (id: `price`), and a prominently styled call-to-action button (id: `cta_button_background` with overlay text id: `cta`) is placed at the bottom-left.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Blue Gray: `#F0F5F9` (general background)
- Steel Blue: `#4682B4` (button & icons)
- Deep Blue: `#2E5984`, `#1E3A5F` (heading, price)
- Soft Gray-Blue: `#E4EEF7`, `#D8E6F2`, `#C9DBE9`, `#B8D0E0` (quadrant backgrounds)
- Midnight Blue: `#2C3E50` (feature text)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (button text)
product_color: This product image features a clean, modern aesthetic using a minimalistic color palette. The primary color is a crisp white (#F4F4F4), which dominates the body, delivering a fresh and high-tech look. The circular door and control panel contrast elegantly in deep charcoal black (#1C1C1C), creating visual focus and depth. A digital display glows in cool cyan-blue (#00B5E2), adding a sleek, modern tech element. The control knobs include accents of muted orange (#F28C38) and steel blue (#6BA5D7), subtly suggesting functionality and user interaction. These colors blend smoothly while being highlighted by the stark contrast of white and black, maintaining clarity and appeal for advertising materials.
